attributes.action: Do not reopen primary schools after Christmas due to the rise in COVID-19 cases.
attributes.additional_details: To keep children and teachers safe and this should be top priority.
attributes.background: Review having primary schools open. Children are more affected by the new variant of COVID-19. It is putting staff and the children’s parents at risk of becoming infected, which could cause even more pressure for the NHS. The NHS already has record levels of COVID patients.
